control.description-key: Multi-file upload with dark mode support, responsive layout (v3.1.2)

property.name: parentEntityName
property.description-key: Logical name of parent entity (e.g., sprk_matter, account, contact)

property.name: parentRecordId
property.description-key: GUID of parent record (without curly braces)

property.name: containerId
property.description-key: SharePoint Embedded Container ID for file uploads

property.name: parentDisplayName
property.description-key: Display name of parent record for UI header (e.g., Matter #12345)

property.name: sdapApiBaseUrl
property.description-key: Base URL for SDAP BFF API (include /api suffix)

property.name: shouldClose
property.description-key: Set to true when upload completes successfully - Custom Page monitors this and calls Exit()
